snippet.title: Dala and the Cursed Forest | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
A new Roguelike Deckbuilder with a unique card fusion mechanic. 
Join Dala, the Mutant maiden, on her quest to explore the cursed forest and restore peace to her cherished sanctuary. With hand-drawn visuals and strategic gameplay, transforms Dala into powerful forms to battle against the mythical creatures.

Game Features:

Deckbuilding: Build the deck the way you want to play.
Card Fusions: Combine different cards to create a more powerful card.
Character Transformations: Transform Dala into different forms unlocking new cards and abilities.
Unique Events: Surprise encounter that blesses and curses your run.
Thai Cuisine and Shopkeeper: Cook special dishes, discover items, and buy upgrades.

If you like what you see, feel free to wishlist the game on https://store.steampowered.com/app/2748770/Dala_and_The_Cursed_Forest. We'd love for you to join us on this adventure into the cursed forest!
